name: attendance-tracker-fullstack
description: Full-stack attendance tracker - Single server deployment

scripts.start: npm run build && cd backend && node server.js
scripts.build:production: cd attendance-tracker && npm run build && echo 'Frontend built successfully!'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd attendance-tracker && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run install:all && npm run build:production && npm run backend:start
